about_the_game:
Explore an ominous dystopian city full of normal people with super powers. DOSI is a hand-drawn 2D adventure game with four main characters featuring dozens of characters to meet. Each character has unique superpower and their own backstory.

Features:
-Four main characters, Four horsemen, Four objects
-Pooly construced city which is good for platforming
-Astronaut, ninja, robot, and giant chicken..?
-Also mysterious / hard-to-understand story

MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION
This game contains suicide, sexual depiction, cannibalism, and may not be suitable for all audiences. Viewer discretion is advised.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains suicide, sexual depiction, cannibalism, and may not be suitable for all audiences. Viewer discretion is advised.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Processor: With SSE2 instruction set
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities.
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: DOSI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: With SSE2 instruction set
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities.
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
